mail-template.name: SignupMailTemplate
mail-template.subject: Activation of MyCP test drive
mail-template.text: Dear ${mailDetailsDTO.toName}, Thank you for your interest in My Cloud Portal, the open source self service portal for the cloud. You can now configure your Eucalyptus private cloud access details at http://www.mycloudportal.in/config/infra and start the sync process to import your data from eucalyptus cloud into my cloud portal. After you configure your account, you can 1. Go to Setup, edit the currency, create your users, projects and departments. 2. Go to Resources, start requesting and consuming infrastructure services. 3. Usage reports menu will give you the metering data of your comsumption. MyCP is open source and free to download and use as a standalone installation too. Its a simple standards compliant java web application backed by MySQL. If you are a developer, please think about participating in the project at http://code.google.com/p/mycloudportal Regards MyCP Team www.mycloudportal.in
